english.segment1: Been feelin' so crazy lately. When it seems that You're not around. The sun and the moon shine bright. But my eyes are all Yours now. Don't know how I lived without You. I don't remember how it used to feel. Lord, I can't imagine if I had no You to hold me
english.segment2: Chorus. Where would I go with no You to run to, No You to hold me when I am afraid?. Who would I be with no You beside me?. I outta know it by now without You there's no me. Ohhh, there's no me
english.segment3: Lord, when I need You, You're always here. To play through the laughter, love throught the tears. And when my heart seems so far away. Into Your arms is where I wanna stay. I tried to find the words to tell You. All the things in my heart's been telling me. I don't wanna know how it feels to have no You to love me
english.segment5: Where would I go with no You to run to, No You to hold me when I am afraid?. Who would I be with no You beside me?. I outta know it by now without You..
english.segment7: where would I go.. where would I be?.
